wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The most powerful way to share your work.
Check out our featured news, projects and more.
An Identity For A Unique Company That We Love.
We Craft The Best Approach To All Our Projects.
Struck is perfect for artists, agencies, startups, software and product designers. Struck helps you showcase your work in a unique way to ensure you're remarkable.
Give your story a whole other dimension of intrigue.
Struck works great on tablets and mobile devices.
Add Your Own Credit or Caption
Greensock is 20 times faster than jQuery and up to 5 times faster that css. Animations look great no matter what hardware you're rocking.
High performance animations powered by greensock.
Check out the latest news from our agency.
A video background is the most unique way to make a stunning impression. Simple, easy, and most importantly - beautiful.

Struck gives you options when it comes to video streaming. Save bandwidth by hosting your videos with Youtube, or self-host your videos for more control over your data. Either way, we have you covered.
Video by salt fresh & field
Add video backgrounds worry-free. We'll automatically serve up static images for mobile devices so your visitors never have to worry about excessive data charges.
Check out the latest news from our agency.
Powerful, simple, and most importantly, beautiful.
Please drop us a line. We’d love to hear from you.

item.title: Page With Sidebar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Page Content

Space, the final frontier. These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise. Its five year mission: to explore strange new worlds, to seek out new life and new civilizations, to boldly go where no man has gone before! [gallery type="slideshow" ids="1299,1298"]

Different Gallery Examples

Enter at your peril, past the vaulted door. Impossible things will happen that the world’s never seen before. In Dexter’s laboratory lives the smartest boy you’ve ever seen, but Dee Dee blows his experiments to Smithereens! There’s gloom and doom when things go boom in Dexter’s lab! [gallery ids="1299,1298"] I bet we been together for a million years, And I bet we’ll be together for a million more. Oh, It’s like I started breathing on the night we kissed, and I can’t remember what I ever did before. What would we do baby, without us? What would we do baby, without us? And there ain’t no nothing we can’t love each other through. What would we do baby, without us? Sha la la la.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: A page example with a sidebar.

item.title: Gallery and Image Styles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Multiple Image Styles

We imagine, create and manage your brand in a new digital world. We create unique experiences that build better business, grow brands and make people’s lives better.
